collections.name: borders

properties.name: country1
properties.description: A country code, representing one side of the border.

properties.name: country2
properties.description: A country code, representing the other side of the border.

properties.name: length_
properties.description: The length of the border between country1 and country2 in kilometers.

collections.description: Represents the shared borders between countries, including the length of each border.

collections.name: city

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the city.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The code of the country where the city belongs.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The name of the province where the city belongs.

properties.name: population
properties.description: The population of the city.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the city.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the city.

collections.description: Contains information about cities, including their location, country, province, and population.

collections.name: continent

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the continent.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The total area of the continent in square kilometers.

collections.description: Contains information about the continents, including their names and total area.

collections.name: country

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the country.

properties.name: code
properties.description: The unique code for the country.

properties.name: capital
properties.description: The name of the capital city.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province where the capital city belongs.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The total area of the country in square kilometers.

properties.name: population
properties.description: The total population of the country.

collections.description: Contains general information about countries, such as name, code, capital, area, and population.

collections.name: desert

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the desert.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The total area of the desert in square kilometers.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the desert.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the desert.

collections.description: Contains information about deserts, including their name, area, and geographic coordinates.

collections.name: economy

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code to which the economic data belongs.

properties.name: gdp
properties.description: The Gross Domestic Product of the country.

properties.name: agriculture
properties.description: The percentage of the country's GDP that comes from agriculture.

properties.name: service
properties.description: The percentage of the country's GDP that comes from the service industry.

properties.name: industry
properties.description: The percentage of the country's GDP that comes from industry.

properties.name: inflation
properties.description: The annual inflation rate of the country.

collections.description: Contains economic data for different countries, including GDP, sector contributions, and inflation rates.

collections.name: encompasses

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code.

properties.name: continent
properties.description: The name of the continent.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: The percentage of the country's area that belongs to the continent.

collections.description: Links countries to the continents they are part of, especially for transcontinental countries.

collections.name: ethnicgroup

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the ethnic group resides.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the ethnic group.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: The percentage of the country's population belonging to this ethnic group.

collections.description: Contains information about ethnic groups within countries and their respective population percentages.

collections.name: geo_desert

properties.name: desert
properties.description: The name of the desert.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the desert is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the desert is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of deserts, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_estuary

properties.name: river
properties.description: The name of the river.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the estuary is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the estuary is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of river estuaries, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_island

properties.name: island
properties.description: The name of the island.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the island is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the island is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of islands, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_lake

properties.name: lake
properties.description: The name of the lake.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the lake is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the lake is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of lakes, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_mountain

properties.name: mountain
properties.description: The name of the mountain.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the mountain is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the mountain is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of mountains, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_river

properties.name: river
properties.description: The name of the river.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the river flows.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the river flows.

collections.description: Geographical location of rivers, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_sea

properties.name: sea
properties.description: The name of the sea.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code bordering the sea.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country bordering the sea.

collections.description: Geographical location of seas, linking them to bordering countries and provinces.

collections.name: geo_source

properties.name: river
properties.description: The name of the river.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the river's source is located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province of the country where the river's source is located.

collections.description: Geographical location of river sources, linking them to specific countries and provinces.

collections.name: ismember

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code of the member.

properties.name: organization
properties.description: The abbreviation of the organization.

properties.name: type_
properties.description: The type of membership (e.g., member, observer).

collections.description: Records the membership of countries in various international organizations.

collections.name: island

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the island.

properties.name: islands
properties.description: The group of islands or archipelago to which this island belongs.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The area of the island in square kilometers.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The maximum elevation of the island in meters.

properties.name: type_
properties.description: The geological type of the island (e.g., volcanic, coral).

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the island.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the island.

collections.description: Contains information about islands, including their name, area, height, type, and geographic coordinates.

collections.name: islandin

properties.name: island
properties.description: The name of the island.

properties.name: sea
properties.description: The sea where the island is located.

properties.name: lake
properties.description: The lake where the island is located.

properties.name: river
properties.description: The river where the island is located.

collections.description: Specifies which sea, lake, or river an island is located in.

collections.name: lake

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the lake.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The total area of the lake in square kilometers.

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The depth of the lake in meters.

properties.name: altitude
properties.description: The altitude of the lake's surface above sea level in meters.

properties.name: type_
properties.description: The type of the lake (e.g., caldera, salt, artificial).

properties.name: river
properties.description: The river that flows out of the lake.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the lake.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the lake.

collections.description: Contains information about lakes, including their physical characteristics and location.

collections.name: language

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the language is spoken.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the language.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: The percentage of the country's population that speaks the language.

collections.description: Records the languages spoken in different countries and their prevalence.

collections.name: located

properties.name: city
properties.description: The name of the city.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province where the city belongs.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the city belongs.

properties.name: river
properties.description: The river where the city is located.

properties.name: lake
properties.description: The lake where the city is located.

properties.name: sea
properties.description: The sea where the city is located.

collections.description: Links cities to the rivers, lakes, or seas they are located on.

extra semantic info.Note: for a given city, there can be several lakes/seas/rivers where it is located at.

collections.name: locatedon

properties.name: city
properties.description: The name of the city.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The province where the city belongs.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the city belongs.

properties.name: island
properties.description: The island on which the city is (at least partially) located.

collections.description: Links cities to the islands they are located on.

collections.name: mergeswith

properties.name: sea1
properties.description: The name of a sea.

properties.name: sea2
properties.description: The name of a sea that merges with sea1.

collections.description: Indicates which seas merge with each other.

collections.name: mountain

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the mountain.

properties.name: mountains
properties.description: The mountain range to which the mountain belongs.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The maximum elevation of the summit of the mountain in meters.

properties.name: type_
properties.description: The type of the mountain (e.g., volcano).

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the mountain.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the mountain.

collections.description: Contains information about mountains, including their name, height, and location.

collections.name: mountainonisland

properties.name: mountain
properties.description: The name of the mountain.

properties.name: island
properties.description: The name of the island where the mountain is located.

collections.description: Links mountains to the islands on which they are located.

collections.name: organization

properties.name: abbreviation
properties.description: The abbreviation of the organization.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The full name of the organization.
sample values: Agency for Cultural and Technical Coo...
Agency for the Prohibition of Nuclear...

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the organization's headquarters are located.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code where the headquarters are located.

properties.name: province
properties.description: The name of the province where the headquarters are located.

properties.name: established
properties.description: The date the organization was established.

collections.description: Contains information about various international organizations, including their headquarters and establishment date.

collections.name: politics

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code.

properties.name: independence
properties.description: The date of independence.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: if the value is null or empty, it means this country is not independent

properties.name: dependent
properties.description: The country code to which this territory belongs, if it is not independent.

properties.name: government
properties.description: The type of government.

collections.description: Contains political information for countries, such as independence date and type of government.

collections.name: population

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code.

properties.name: population_growth
properties.description: The annual population growth rate (in percent).

properties.name: infant_mortality
properties.description: The infant mortality rate per thousand births.

collections.description: Contains population statistics for countries, including growth and infant mortality rates.

collections.name: province

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the administrative division (province).

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code to which the province belongs.

properties.name: population
properties.description: The population of the province.

properties.name: area
properties.description: The total area of the province in square kilometers.

properties.name: capital
properties.description: The name of the capital city of the province.

properties.name: capprov
properties.description: The name of the province where the capital city belongs.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: note that capprov is not necessarily equal to name

collections.description: Contains information about provinces or administrative divisions within countries.

collections.name: religion

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the religion.

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: The percentage of the country's population that practices the religion.

collections.description: Records the religions practiced in different countries and their prevalence.

collections.name: river

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the river.

properties.name: river
properties.description: The river into which this river flows (if it is a tributary).

properties.name: lake
properties.description: The lake into which this river flows.

properties.name: sea
properties.description: The sea into which this river flows.

properties.name: length_
properties.description: The length of the river in kilometers.

properties.name: sourcelongitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the river's source.

properties.name: sourcelatitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the river's source.

properties.name: mountains
properties.description: The mountain range where the river's source is located.

properties.name: sourcealtitude
properties.description: The elevation (above sea level) of the river's source in meters.

properties.name: estuarylongitude
properties.description: The geographic longitude of the river's estuary.

properties.name: estuarylatitude
properties.description: The geographic latitude of the river's estuary.

collections.description: Contains detailed information about rivers, including their course, length, and source/estuary locations.

extra semantic info.note: at most one out of {river,lake,sea} can be non-null

collections.name: sea

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the sea.

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The maximum depth of the sea in meters.

collections.description: Contains information about seas, including their names and maximum depths.

collections.name: target

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country code.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target classification of the country.

collections.description: Contains a target classification for each country.
